docs.text: microscopemetrics-schema A schema for microscope-metrics, a python package for microscope QC URI: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema Name: microscopemetrics-schema Classes Class Description CentersFitted The fitted center of detected objects. Intended to be used with ROIs. CentersGeometric The geometric center of detected objects. Intended to be used with ROIs. CentersMaxIntensity The position of maximum intensity of detected objects. Intended to be used with ROIs. CentersOfMass The center of mass of detected objects. Intended to be used with ROIs. ChannelSeries A series representing channels Color A color as defined by RGB values and an optional alpha value ColumnSeries A series of columns Comment A comment DataReference A reference to a data resource Experimenter The person that performed the experiment or developed the protocol MetaObject None MetricsInput An abstract class for analysis inputs ArgolightBInput None ArgolightEInput None FieldIlluminationInput None PSFBeadsInput None MetricsOutput An abstract class for analysis outputs ArgolightBOutput None ArgolightEOutput None FieldIlluminationOutput None PSFBeadsOutput None MicroscopeCollection A collection of microscopes NamedObject An object with a name and a description Channel A image channel Column Attributes of a column MetricsObject A base object for all microscope-metrics objects. Image A microscope-metrics image ImageMask A mask image. Either a binary image or a label image KeyValues A collection of key-value pairs ArgolightBDistanceKeyValues None ArgolightBIntensityKeyValues None ArgolightEKeyValues None FieldIlluminationKeyValues None PSFBeadsKeyValues None MetricsDataset A base object on which microscope-metrics runs the analysis ArgolightBDataset An Argolight sample pattern B dataset. This pattern consists of an array of circles ArgolightEDataset An Argolight sample pattern E dataset. It contains resolution data on the axis indicated: - axis 1 = Y resolution = lines along X axis - axis 2 = X resolution = lines along Y axis FieldIlluminationDataset A field illumination dataset PSFBeadsDataset A PSF beads dataset MetricsDatasetCollection A collection of microscope-metrics datasets HarmonizedMetricsDatasetCollection A collection of harmonized microscope-metrics datasets. All of the datasets in the collection share the same analysis and processing parameters. Microscope A microscope Roi A ROI (Region Of Interest). Collection of shapes and an image to which they are applied ArgolightBCentersOfMass None Table A microscope-metrics table Tag A tag Protocol Set of instructions for preparing and imaging a sample Sample A sample is a standard physical object that is imaged by a microscope Shape A shape Ellipse An ellipse as defined by x, y coordinates and x and y radii Line A line as defined by x1, y1, x2, y2 coordinates Mask A mask as defined by a boolean image Point A point as defined by x and y coordinates Polygon A polygon as defined by a series of vertexes and a boolean to indicate if closed or not Rectangle A rectangle as defined by x, y coordinates and width, height ProfilesIntensity Profiles computed on the image. Intended to be used with ROIs. RoiMeasurements Measurements computed on the ROIs of an image. Intended to be used with ROIs. TimeSeries A series whose values represent time Vertex A vertex as defined by x and y coordinates Slots Slot Description acquisition_datetime The datetime of the acquisition alpha The alpha value of the color (optional) analyzed_bead_centers The centers of the beads that have been analyzed argolight_b_image Input parameter: image of the argolight b pattern in the order TZYXC argolight_e_image Image of the argolight e pattern provided in the order TZYXC array_data A non-required slot for non-serializable array data object author The author of the comment authors The authors of the protocol docs.text: Class Description CentersFitted The fitted center of detected objects. Intended to be used with ROIs. CentersGeometric The geometric center of detected objects. Intended to be used with ROIs. CentersMaxIntensity The position of maximum intensity of detected objects. Intended to be used with ROIs. CentersOfMass The center of mass of detected objects. Intended to be used with ROIs. ChannelSeries A series representing channels Color A color as defined by RGB values and an optional alpha value ColumnSeries A series of columns Comment A comment DataReference A reference to a data resource Experimenter The person that performed the experiment or developed the protocol MetaObject None MetricsInput An abstract class for analysis inputs ArgolightBInput None ArgolightEInput None FieldIlluminationInput None PSFBeadsInput None MetricsOutput An abstract class for analysis outputs ArgolightBOutput None ArgolightEOutput None FieldIlluminationOutput None PSFBeadsOutput None MicroscopeCollection A collection of microscopes NamedObject An object with a name and a description Channel A image channel Column Attributes of a column MetricsObject A base object for all microscope-metrics objects. Image A microscope-metrics image ImageMask A mask image. Either a binary image or a label image KeyValues A collection of key-value pairs ArgolightBDistanceKeyValues None ArgolightBIntensityKeyValues None ArgolightEKeyValues None FieldIlluminationKeyValues None PSFBeadsKeyValues None MetricsDataset A base object on which microscope-metrics runs the analysis ArgolightBDataset An Argolight sample pattern B dataset. This pattern consists of an array of circles ArgolightEDataset An Argolight sample pattern E dataset. It contains resolution data on the axis indicated: - axis 1 = Y resolution = lines along X axis - axis 2 = X resolution = lines along Y axis FieldIlluminationDataset A field illumination dataset PSFBeadsDataset A PSF beads dataset MetricsDatasetCollection A collection of microscope-metrics datasets HarmonizedMetricsDatasetCollection A collection of harmonized microscope-metrics datasets. All of the datasets in the collection share the same analysis and processing parameters. Microscope A microscope Roi A ROI (Region Of Interest). Collection of shapes and an image to which they are applied ArgolightBCentersOfMass None Table A microscope-metrics table Tag A tag Protocol Set of instructions for preparing and imaging a sample Sample A sample is a standard physical object that is imaged by a microscope Shape A shape Ellipse An ellipse as defined by x, y coordinates and x and y radii Line A line as defined by x1, y1, x2, y2 coordinates Mask A mask as defined by a boolean image Point A point as defined by x and y coordinates Polygon A polygon as defined by a series of vertexes and a boolean to indicate if closed or not Rectangle A rectangle as defined by x, y coordinates and width, height ProfilesIntensity Profiles computed on the image. Intended to be used with ROIs. RoiMeasurements Measurements computed on the ROIs of an image. Intended to be used with ROIs. TimeSeries A series whose values represent time Vertex A vertex as defined by x and y coordinates

fraction of the upper intensity range occupied by the center of illumination region. That is, a value of 0.1 means that the center of illumination occupies the top 10% of the intensity range. microscope-metrics tries to adapt the threshold of this intensity so that the area occupied is not too large. One value per channel. from_schema: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema rank: 1000 multivalued: true alias: center_region_intensity_fraction owner: FieldIlluminationKeyValues domain_of: - FieldIlluminationKeyValues range: float minimum_value: 0.0 maximum_value: 1.0 center_region_area_fraction: name: center_region_area_fraction description: The fraction of the area occupied by the center of illumination region. That is, a value of 0.1 means that the center of illumination occupies the top 10% of the intensity range. microscope-metrics tries to adapt the threshold of this intensity so that the area occupied is not too large. One value per channel. from_schema: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema rank: 1000 multivalued: true alias: center_region_intensity_fraction owner: FieldIlluminationKeyValues domain_of: - FieldIlluminationKeyValues range: float minimum_value: 0.0 maximum_value: 1.0 center_region_area_fraction: name: center_region_area_fraction description: The fraction of the area occupied by the center of illumination region. If the centre upper intensity fraction is 0.1, that means that the center of illumination occupies 10% of the area of the image. One value per channel. from_schema: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema rank: 1000 multivalued: true alias: center_region_area_fraction owner: FieldIlluminationKeyValues domain_of: - FieldIlluminationKeyValues range: float minimum_value: 0.0 maximum_value: 1.0 center_of_mass_y: name: center_of_mass_y description: The y coordinate of the center of mass of the center of illumination region. Does not apply to resolution measurements ifabsent: float(1.0) domain_of: - PSFBeadsInput - ArgolightBInput required: true attributes: psf_beads_images: name: psf_beads_images description: The image containing the beads provided in the order TZYXC. docs.text: Slot: center_region_intensity_fraction The fraction of the upper intensity range occupied by the center of illumination region. That is, a value of 0.1 means that the center of illumination occupies the top 10% of the intensity range. microscope-metrics tries to adapt the threshold of this intensity so that the area occupied is not too large. One value per channel.
